function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"High power consumption from WiFi communications","Impact":"Drains battery life and increases operational costs","Mitigation":"Optimize WiFi transmission frequency and reduce power consumption during communication","Technologies":"Low-power WiFi modules and transmission optimization algorithms","People":"Device users, maintenance personnel","Owner":"IoT device manufacturers"},{"Description":"Vulnerability to software changes due to FOSS technologies","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized software modifications that could compromise IEQ monitoring","Mitigation":"Implement secure software update mechanisms and access controls","Technologies":"Digital signatures, secure boot mechanisms, and access control lists","People":"System administrators, software developers","Owner":"IEQ monitoring system operators"},{"Description":"Potential for data security breaches during MQTT communication","Impact":"Risk of unauthorized access to monitored data during MQTT communication","Mitigation":"Implement end-to-end encryption and access control mechanisms for MQTT communication","Technologies":"TLS/SSL encryption, authentication mechanisms, and access control lists","People":"Data security professionals, system administrators","Owner":"IEQ monitoring system operators"}]}
